description:
Saves a list of files to a folder in Google Drive.
The folder should be shared to with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com` and given `can edit` permission.

input.name: files
input.description: A list composed of file contents with one record per file.

input.name: folder
input.description: The URL of the folder on Google Drive.

output.name: urls
output.description: A list of Google Drive URLs of the created file.

output.name: ids
output.description: The ID of the created file.
